channel.title: Need Tutorials
channel.description:
If this is wrong section [b]FLAME AWAY[/b] because I see no where else as where to put this.
But I need a tutorial on adding: Construction, Summoning, Hunter (Never seen, but eh), Herbalore, Runecrafting (Kind of, I already have but theres some bugs), Mining, Firemaking, Agility, Crafting (Same as RC).
If you have any of these let me know please. I searched the Tutorials forum but couldn't find.
Thanks in advance.

@Evilpker1234 wrote:

RS2 Server Development/HELP And I needed help. So here it stays, locked its locked owell. Thanks for absolutely no help… Why even post if you couldn’t help me?

Meh, O’well thanks anyways.

(This post sounds a bit jerkish but Im not meaning it like that)
